it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Network

Class ClientMessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Network.ClientMessageFactory

  • public class ClientMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    this class allows to simply generate all the messages used on the client side of the game in their JSON format. ClientMessageFactory offers a multitude of different static method which returns a String suitable to be send. For more details on the network protocol see the wiki.

    • Method Detail

      • buildCHGNAMEmessage

        public static java.lang.String buildCHGNAMEmessage(java.lang.String playerUUID,
                                                   java.lang.String name)
        allows to generate a CHGNAME message
        Parameters:
        playerUUID - the UUID of the player who wants send the message
        name - the player name which will be show during the game
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent

      • buildMSGmessage

        public static java.lang.String buildMSGmessage(java.lang.String playerUUID,
                                               java.lang.String message,
                                               java.lang.String destination,
                                               boolean allFlag)
        allows to generate a MSG message
        Parameters:
        playerUUID - the UUID of the player who wants send the message
        message - the message which will be sent to the receiver
        destination - the receiver of this message
        allFlag - if settet true, the message will be show to all the player connected to the game
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent

      • buildASKACTmessage

        public static java.lang.String buildASKACTmessage(java.lang.String actionType,
                                                  int pawnID,
                                                  int regionID,
                                                  int spaceID,
                                                  int indexCost,
                                                  java.lang.String cardName)
        allows to generate a ASKACT message
        Parameters:
        actionType - the type of action performed
        pawnID - the ID of the moved family member
        regionID - the region ID where the action has been performed
        spaceID - the space ID of the specified region ID where the pawn has been moved
        indexCost - additional info, which indicates what card's cost the player has choosen to pay. If the card has a single cost this field is setted to 0
        cardName - additional info, which indicates the name of the taken card. If no card has been taken this field is setted null
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent

      • buildASKACTmessage

        public static java.lang.String buildASKACTmessage(java.lang.String actionType,
                                                  int regionID,
                                                  int spaceID,
                                                  com.eclipsesource.json.JsonObject payload)
        allows to generate a ASKACT message, when it must be generated by a bonus action
        Parameters:
        actionType - the type of action performed
        regionID - the region ID where the action has been performed
        spaceID - the space ID of the specified region ID where the pawn has been moved
        payload - additional info used to complete the action definition
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent

      • buildASKLDRACTmessage

        public static java.lang.String buildASKLDRACTmessage(java.lang.String gameUUID,
                                                     java.lang.String leader,
                                                     java.lang.String decision)
        allows to generate a ASKLDRACT message
        Parameters:
        gameUUID - the game UUID
        leader - the choosen leader card
        decision - string representing the type of leader action performed
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent

      • buildLDRSETmessage

        public static java.lang.String buildLDRSETmessage(java.lang.String gameUUID,
                                                  java.lang.String playerUUID,
                                                  com.eclipsesource.json.JsonArray cardList)
        allows to generate a LDRSET message, this message is used only during the start leader card distribution phase
        Parameters:
        gameUUID - the game UUID
        leader - the choosen leader card
        cardList - a JsonArray containing the list of remaining leader card
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent

      • buildTRNENDmessage

        public static java.lang.String buildTRNENDmessage(java.lang.String gameUUID,
                                                  java.lang.String name)
        allows to generate a LDRSET message, this message is used only during the start leader card distribution phase
        Parameters:
        gameUUID - the game UUID
        name - the UUID of the player which has ended his turn
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent

      • buldSENDPOPEmessage

        public static java.lang.String buldSENDPOPEmessage(java.lang.String gameUUID,
                                                   java.lang.String name,
                                                   boolean answer,
                                                   int faith)
        allows to generate a SENDPOPE message, this message is used only during the excommunication phase to communicate the client decision
        Parameters:
        gameUUID - the game UUID
        name - the UUID of the player
        answer - a boolen flag representing the client decision (true if client has decided to show his faith, false otherwise)
        faith - the faith points of the player
        Returns:
        the string which will be sent
